name: sm
desc: Utilization of SM, percent of time over the past sample period during which one or more kernels was executing on the GPU.

name: mem
desc: Utilization of memory, percent of time over the past sample period during which global (device) memory was being read or written.

name: enc
desc: Utilization of GPU video encoder, percent of time over the past sample period during which GPU video encoder was being used

name: dec
desc: Utilization of GPU video decoder, percent of time over the past sample period during which GPU video decoder was being used

name: mclk
desc: Current frequency of memory clock in megahertz

name: pclk
desc: Current frequency of SM in megahertz

name: pviol
desc: Power violation, percent of time over the past sample period during which power went over the allowed maximum

name: tviol
desc: Thermal violation, percent of time over the past sample period during which temperature went over the allowed maximum

name: fb
desc: Usage of frame buffer memory (global/device memory) in megabytes.

name: bar1
desc: Usage of BAR1 memory in megabytes. BAR1 is used to map the FB so that it can be directly accessed by the CPU or by 3rd party devices (peer-to-peer on the PCIe bus).

name: sbecc
desc: Number of single bit ECC errors. Single bit ECC error can be auto-corrected.

name: dbecc
desc: Number of double bit ECC errors. Double bit ECC error cannot be auto-corrected.

name: rxpci
desc: The GPU-centric receive throughput across the PCIe bus in MB/s over the past sample period.

name: txpci
desc: The GPU-centric transmission throughput across the PCIe bus in MB/s over the past sample period.
